Package com.adventnet.jmx

This package provides core classes which are used for implementating the JMX specification.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultClassLoader A simple test class loader capable of loading from multiple sources, such as local files or a URL.
DefaultDynamicMBean This class acts as the wrapper dynamic mbean for standard mbeans that intends to register with the MBeanServer.
DefaultLoaderRepositoryExt  
MBeanServerImpl This is the implementation class for MBean manipulation on the agent side.
NotificationHandler  
NotificationThread  
ObjectInputStreamSupport  
 

Package com.adventnet.jmx Description

This package provides core classes which are used for implementating the JMX specification.
